parameters.question: How do you drag an item across the screen?
parameters.choice1: Tap twice on the item, then move your finger to another part of the screen.
parameters.choice2: Touch and hold the item, then move your finger on the screen without lifting it.
parameters.choice3: Touch the item, then shake the phone.
parameters.choice4: Touch the item, then press hard on the screen.
parameters.answer: Touch and hold the item, then move your finger on the screen without lifting it.
